page.title: 11The Community Centre
page.content: The community centre began as a memorial to local people who were killed during the Second World War, and originally consisted of a football pitch, a cricket pitch, a few swings and slides, and changing rooms. It is now being extended to include tennis courts and an all-weather playing area. Plans for the future include a village hall for Disco's, Whist Drives, shows and other activities which, it is hoped, will involve all local people. The funding is being raised mainly by the efforts of the people themselves, one of the efforts being a Gala which it is intended will become an annual event, and inludes a fell-race which the organizers hope will eventually be of national or even international standard.
